after googling the name of the torrent... or the cd as the case may be. i found that there is a website with a cd with the same name and 12 tracks. sound familiar. the website contains demos, atleast i think there demos, and names for all the tracks.
Amazon sells the LP (1973), but with 14 tracks.  Anyway, thanks for the upload!
